= Flow control in Bash =

Conditions are written with [[Bash comparators]] in [[Bash brackets]].

== Basic if ==
`if` _condition_
`then`
    _code 1_
`fi`

== If with else ==
`if` _condition_
`then`
    _code 1_
`else`
    _code 2_
`fi`

== If, elif and else ==
`if` _condition 1_
`then`
    _code 1_
`elif` _condition 2_
`then`
    _code 2_
`elif` _condition 3_
`then`
    _code 3_
`else`
    _code 4_
`fi`
